docblock.description: Client that interacts with the server part of ImboClient
docblock.long-description: This client includes methods that can be used to easily interact with a ImboClient server. All requests made by the client goes through a driver.

docblock.description: Public key used for signed requests
Private key used for signed requests

tag.name: param
tag.description: One or more URLs to the Imbo server, including protocol

tag.description: The URL to send a request to

tag.name: param
tag.description: The URL to send a request to

docblock.description: Delete an image from the server
Get the number of images currently stored on the server
docblock.long-description: If the server responds with an error, this method must return false.

docblock.description: Get an array of images currently stored on the server
docblock.long-description: If the server responds with an error, this method must return false.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns false on error, and an array of ImboClient\ImageQuery\ImageInterface instances on success (can be empty)

docblock.description: Get the binary data of an image stored on the server
docblock.long-description: If the server responds with an error, this method must return false.

docblock.description: Get the binary data of an image stored on the server
docblock.long-description: If the server responds with an error, this method must return false.

tag.name: param
tag.description: ImageUrl-instance for the image you want to retrieve

docblock.long-description:
This method returns an associative array with the following keys:

  • width: Width of the image in pixels
  • height: Height of the image in pixels
  • size: Size of the image in bytes

If the image does not exist on the server, this method returns false.

parse_markers.critical: No short description for class CurlTest

docblock.description: URL to the script that the tests should send requests to

This method will PUT the current file (__FILE__) to the test script. The test script will then read this file and inject the md5 sum of the file into the output. This method will then compute the md5 sum and make sure it's the same as the one from the test script.

tag.name: expectedException
tag.description: An error occured. Request timed out during transfer (limit: 2s).

tag.name: expectedException
tag.description: An error occured. Request timed out during transfer (limit: 1s).
